001package net.tnemc.core.io.serialization.impl;

021import net.tnemc.core.TNECore;
022import net.tnemc.core.account.Account;
023import net.tnemc.core.account.PlayerAccount;
024import net.tnemc.core.account.SharedAccount;
025import net.tnemc.core.account.holdings.HoldingsEntry;
026import net.tnemc.core.account.holdings.Wallet;
027import net.tnemc.core.account.shared.Member;
028import net.tnemc.core.api.response.AccountAPIResponse;
029import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.io.serialization.JSONAble;
030import org.json.simple.JSONArray;
031import org.json.simple.JSONObject;
032import org.json.simple.parser.JSONParser;
033import org.json.simple.parser.ParseException;
034
035import java.util.Optional;
036import java.util.UUID;
037
038/**
039 * SerialAccount
040 *
041 * @author creatorfromhell
042 * @since 0.1.2.0
043 */
044public class SerialAccount implements JSONAble<Account> {
045
046  /**
047   * Used to serialize this object to a JSON-valid string.
048   *
049   * @param account The object to serialize.
050   *
051   * @return The {@link JSONObject} associated with the JSON-valid String.
052   */
053  @Override
054  public JSONObject toJSON(final Account account) {
055
056    final JSONObject json = new JSONObject();
057
058    json.put("identifier", account.getIdentifier());
059    json.put("name", account.getName());
060    json.put("creationDate", account.getCreationDate());
061    json.put("pin", account.getPin());
062    json.put("status", account.getStatus().identifier());
063    json.put("type", account.type());
064
065    final JSONArray holdingsArray = new JSONArray();
066    for(final HoldingsEntry entry : account.getWallet().entryList()) {
067      holdingsArray.add(new SerialHoldings().toJSON(entry));
068    }
069    json.put("holdings", holdingsArray);
070
071    if(account instanceof SharedAccount shared) {
072      json.put("owner", shared.getOwner());
073
074      final JSONArray membersArray = new JSONArray();
075      for(final Member member : shared.getMembers().values()) {
076        membersArray.add(new SerialMember().toJSON(member));
077      }
078      json.put("members", membersArray);
079    }
080
081    if(account instanceof PlayerAccount player) {
082      json.put("lastOnline", player.getLastOnline());
083      json.put("language", player.getLanguage());
084    }
085
086    return json;
087  }
088
089  /**
090   * Used to generate information for this object from
091   *
092   * @param serialized The JSON-valid String that we are going to deserialize.
093   *
094   * @return The object that was deserialized from the JSON string.
095   */
096  @Override
097  public Account fromJSON(final String serialized) {
098
099    try {
100      final JSONParser parser = new JSONParser();
101      final JSONObject json = (JSONObject)parser.parse(serialized);
102
103      final String identifier = (String)json.get("identifier");
104      final String name = (String)json.get("name");
105      final String type = (String)json.get("type");
106
107      final AccountAPIResponse response = TNECore.eco().account().createAccount(identifier,
108                                                                                name,
109                                                                                !(type.equalsIgnoreCase("player") ||
110                                                                                  type.equalsIgnoreCase("bedrock")));
111      if(response.getResponse().success()) {
112
113        final Optional<Account> account = response.getAccount();
114        if(account.isPresent()) {
115
116          //Basic account variables
117          account.get().setPin((String)json.get("pin"));
118          account.get().setCreationDate((Long)json.get("creationDate"));
119          account.get().setStatus(TNECore.eco().account().findStatus((String)json.get("status")));
120
121          final JSONArray holdingsArray = (JSONArray)json.get("holdings");
122          final Wallet wallet = new Wallet();
123          for(final Object entryObj : holdingsArray) {
124            final JSONObject entryJson = (JSONObject)entryObj;
125            final HoldingsEntry entry = new SerialHoldings().fromJSON(entryJson.toJSONString());
126            wallet.setHoldings(entry);
127          }
128
129
130          //Shared accounts.
131          if(account.get() instanceof SharedAccount shared) {
132            shared.setOwner((UUID)json.get("owner"));
133
134            if(json.containsKey("members")) {
135
136              final JSONArray membersArray = (JSONArray)json.get("members");
137              for(final Object memberObj : membersArray) {
138
139                final JSONObject memberJson = (JSONObject)memberObj;
140                final Member member = new SerialMember().fromJSON(memberJson.toJSONString());
141                shared.getMembers().put(member.getId(), member);
142              }
143            }
144          }
145
146          //Player-based accounts.
147          if(account.get() instanceof PlayerAccount player) {
148
149            player.setLastOnline((Long)json.get("lastOnline"));
150            player.setLanguage((String)json.get("language"));
151          }
152          return account.get();
153        }
154      }
155    } catch(ParseException | NumberFormatException | ClassCastException e) {
156      e.printStackTrace();
157      return null;
158    }
159    return null;
160  }
161}
